name: Mr Red Rectangle
description:
Help Mr Red Rectangle escape from Deepest Darkest Dungeon™. Move with caution, The walls are closing in, soon he will be trapped and stuck in the Deepest Darkest Dungeon™ forever. Oh, wait. Time travel?

Controls

  • LEFT / RIGHT to move
  • UP to jump
  • SPACE to reverse time

* You may have to click on the iframe to capture input
